result.eng: The company promotes certain products on the Irish market.
result.ga: Déanann an comhlacht táirgí áirithe a chur chun cinn ar mhargadh na hÉireann
result.orig: Déanann an comhlacht táirgí áirithe a chur chun cinn ar mhargadh na hÉireann
result.html: Déanann an comhlacht táirgí áirithe a chur chun cinn ar mhargadh na hÉireannThe company promotes certain products on the Irish market.
result.ponchtml: Déanann an coṁlaċt táirgí áiriṫe a ċur ċun cinn ar ṁargaḋ na hÉireannThe company promotes certain products on the Irish market.

result.eng: The author makes a reference to a specific case.
result.ga: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do chás ar leith
result.orig: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do chás ar leith
result.html: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do chás ar leithThe author makes a reference to a specific case.
result.ponchtml: Déanann an t-údar tagairt do ċás ar leiṫThe author makes a reference to a specific case.

result.eng: We do the same thing year after year.
result.ga: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.orig: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh bliana
result.html: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaidh blianaWe do the same thing year after year.
result.ponchtml: Déanann muid an rud céanna bliain i ndiaiḋ blianaWe do the same thing year after year.

result.eng: You yourself make history with your decisions, your opinions and your actions.
result.ga: Déanann tú féin an stair de bharr do chinntí do thuairimí agus do bhearta
result.orig: Déanann tú féin an stair de bharr do chinntí do thuairimí agus do bhearta
result.html: Déanann tú féin an stair de bharr do chinntí do thuairimí agus do bheartaYou yourself make history with your decisions, your opinions and your actions.
result.ponchtml: Déanann tú féin an stair de ḃarr do ċinntí do ṫuairimí agus do ḃeartaYou yourself make history with your decisions, your opinions and your actions.

result.eng: It doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ga: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.orig: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.html: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a ċoṁairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.

result.eng: He makes a laughing stock out of Ireland.
result.ga: Déanann sé ceap magaidh d'Éirinn
result.html: Déanann sé ceap magaidh d'ÉirinnHe makes a laughing stock out of Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Déanann sé ceap magaiḋ d'ÉirinnHe makes a laughing stock out of Ireland.
